citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4 pm on
20-Feb-20.
Under 18 year old residents were home and answered door. Adults were out of town or at work until after 6 pm.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

Under 18 year old residents were home and answered door.  Adults were out of town or at work until after 6 pm.
